summary: The Unlimited Plan for Public Safety PTT App - Tango Tango offers a PTT app for public safety agencies that connects their dispatch channel to phones. The app allows users to talk with their agency's radio system from anywhere with an internet connection. It also offers unlimited, encrypted push-to-talk channels and the ability to add temporary users for mutual aid scenarios or setup permanent interoperability groups. The app includes features such as location tracking, recording and playback, and two-tone paging decode. The Unlimited Plan costs $2,995 per year and includes unlimited users, one radio channel connected, and 24/7/365 support.
